author: ngweihan_eth
content:
EIP7736: Leaf-level State Expiry

This was presented earlier in the AllCoreDevs meeting. Welcome more feedback and discussions on this topic ðŸ˜„

author: lightclient
content: this seems like a nice proposal! i would like to see more thinking around how and when clients should prune the leaf data, what the expected state saving is with the pruned data gone while retaining the stems, and better understand what happens when execution tries to access pruned data
